questions.question: What is the primary purpose of function in graphic design?
options: To meet practical objectives and communicate effectively
To use as many design elements as possible
To increase complexity for aesthetic impact
questions.answer: To meet practical objectives and communicate effectively

questions.question: What additional element could strengthen the Introduction section?
questions.answer: Examples contrasting different design purposes

questions.question: Which term describes a document outlining client needs for a project?
questions.answer: Design brief

questions.question: What is recommended to improve the 'Components of a Good Design Brief' section?
questions.answer: Providing an example design brief

questions.question: What is one characteristic of effective creative design?
options: It should look complex and detailed
It should be memorable, clear, and credible
It should be only visually appealing
questions.answer: It should be memorable, clear, and credible

questions.question: Which benefit of creative design was highlighted in the document?
options: Increasing brand identity and customer attention
questions.answer: Increasing brand identity and customer attention

questions.question: What could enhance the impact of the 'Creative Design' section?
options: Examples of creative design that align with brand goals
A detailed description of visual elements
questions.answer: Examples of creative design that align with brand goals

questions.question: In which way could the 'Advantages of Creative Design' section be improved?
options: Add case studies of brands using creative design effectively
questions.answer: Add case studies of brands using creative design effectively

questions.question: What does functional design prioritize?
questions.answer: Clear communication and usability

questions.question: What addition is recommended for the 'Functional Design' section?
options: Discussion of user-focused techniques for accessibility
questions.answer: Discussion of user-focused techniques for accessibility

questions.question: Why is balancing creative and functional design important?
options: It makes designs more visually complex
It ensures that designs are both usable and engaging
It reduces the need for creativity
It removes the need for client feedback
questions.answer: It ensures that designs are both usable and engaging

questions.question: What practical advice would improve the final section?
options: Including tips for integrating both creative and functional design
questions.answer: Including tips for integrating both creative and functional design

questions.question: Which of these was NOT suggested as a general improvement?
options: Add more images and visual elements
questions.answer: Include technical terminology

questions.question: What is one benefit of using real-world examples in the document?
options: Illustrates principles in a practical context
Reduces the length of the document
Limits the amount of information shared
questions.answer: Illustrates principles in a practical context

questions.question: What type of information should be highlighted in the Introduction?
questions.answer: Key terms like 'objective' and 'target audience'

questions.question: Which element could make the 'Components of a Good Design Brief' section stronger?
options: Examples showing the impact on design
questions.answer: Examples showing the impact on design

questions.question: How can the 'Creative Design' section be made more engaging?
options: Make it longer without adding examples
questions.answer: Include visuals showing memorable designs

questions.question: What could strengthen the overall readability of the document?
options: Adding more subheadings and visual elements
questions.answer: Adding more subheadings and visual elements

questions.question: What does the document recommend about creativity in functional design?
options: It should not be visually appealing
It should adhere to functional goals
It should be completely separate from usability
questions.answer: It should adhere to functional goals

questions.question: Why would a balanced design affect conversion rates?
options: It makes designs more visually complex
It supports a satisfying user experience
questions.answer: It supports a satisfying user experience
